parlimenthuwa wisin sammatha karana lada doshabhiyoga yojanawa 2013 janawari 13 dinadi janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha wisin aparanumatha kirimen bandaranayaka mahathmiya nilayen paha kerini. [55][56] samaharak wartha paridi janadhipathi rajapaksha wisin bandaranayaka mahathmiyata wishrama yame wikalpaya laba dunnada aya wisin eya prathikshepa kara atha.[57][58] aparangaya[sanskaranaya] parlimenthuwa wisin doshabhiyoga yojanawa sammatha kara ganumen pasuwa wuwada, bandaranayaka mahathmiya wisin parlimenthu therim karaka sabhawa wyawastha wirodhi bawata prakasha kerunu shreshtadhikarana thinduwa huwa dakwamin pawasa sitiye aya nilayen baharawa noyana bawayi.[59]

wideshiya bhashawan hi wachana deshiya bhasha wyawaharayata ganime di bhashawe mulika gunangawalata patahani nowana aakarayata yodagatha yuthu ya.pasugiya dasaka thunaka kalayaka sita shri lankawa nawa adhirajyawadi balawegayange grahanayata nathukara ganime prabala uthsahayaka yedi athi athara ma ee ha samagamiwa sanskruthika aakramanayakata da me wanawita shri lankawa goduru kara atha.ehi pradhana aakramanika upaya margaya lesa sinhala basa winasha karamin ingirisiya pamanak raja karawimata uthsaha ganu labana pahath kriyawaliyak kriyathmaka wemin pawathina bawata ingi pala we.wideshiya bhashathorathuru thakshanaya haraha thakshanaya wishaya sinhala basin kala nohaki yayi pawasamin, sinhala nodanna bawa wasan karamin - (kumarathungu munidasun pawasu paridi loji - thadhatara yannata muwa wi) sinhalaya winasha kirime prabala uthsahayaka yedi athi bawa da norahasaki.eheth me wana wita wideshiya bhashawan ge wachana wisheshayen ma ingrisi bhashawe wachana amu amuwe sinhalayata nogalapena aakarayata yoda ganimin karanu labana wachana harambaaya prasiddha madhyaya harahada hitha matha sidukaramin siti.bhashawa wilasithawak kara ganimin welenda danwim pracharanaya sandaha yoda ganimen karanu labana winashakari kriyawaliya pilikulin yuthuwa hela dakiya yuthu ya.

bandaranayaka ghathanayen pasuwa 1960 marthu 19 wani dina pawathi maha mathiwaranayedi kottasa 151 wu mulu chanda kottasawalin aasana 50 jaya labu e. ja. pakshaya aandu balaya laba dadli senanayaka mahatha agamathi weddi aasana 46 labu shri la. ni. pakshaye nayakaya wu si. pi. da silwa wipaksha nayaka dhurayata path wiya.

elambaena palath sabha mathiwaranaya wenuwen eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaya wisin pawathwanu labana mahajana raliya mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma ge pa්radhanathwayen mathale - nawula di ada (18) sawasa pawathweyi.eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaye apekshakayanta aadhara pinisa wayambaa ha madhyama palathwala sanwidhanaya kara athi pa්racharaka rali malawata janadhipathithuma pa්rathama warata sahabhagiwanne me raswimataya.mewani pa්racharaka rali thawath kihipayakata janadhipathithuma sahabhagiwimata niyamithaya.aga්ramathya rathnasiri wika්ramanayaka mahathage pa්radhanathwayen da me palath deke mathiwarana pa්racharaka rali 9 k pawathwimata da sanwidhanaya kara atha.ethumage pa්radhanathwayen pasugiya dinawala mathiwarana pa්racharaka rali dekak da pawathwini.mathi amathiwarunge pa්radhanathwayen da wayambaa ha madhyama palath mathiwarana pa්racharaka rali 22 k sanwidhanaya kara pawathwena athara chandadayakayan hamuwi gen geta yame chanda wyaparayak da eksath janatha nidahas sandhana mathiwarana pa්racharaka wadasatahanata athulathya.
ee nisa magen labena kament tika danna une na.
